title: Rangers: Steven Gerrard to hold head coach talks with former club
description: Rangers are poised to hold talks this week with Steven Gerrard over their managerial vacancy.
content:
Steven Gerrard is to hold talks with Rangers about returning to the club as their new head coach.
BBC Sport reported on Tuesday that the Scottish Premiership club were open to reappointing Gerrard, but were waiting for confirmation that the former Li... [1574 chars]

title: Celebrity Traitors: Charlotte Church and Niko Omilana to enter castle as series begins
description: There's £100,000 up for grabs for the charity of the winner's choosing - but will the Traitors remain undetected?

title: Ruben Amorim: Manchester United boss needs three years to prove himself a 'great' coach, says co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe
description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says manager Ruben Amorim needs three years to prove he is a "great" coach.
content:
Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim needs three years to prove he is a "great" coach, says co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe.
Amorim will complete a year at the Old Trafford helm in November but his record since arriving from Portuguese club Sporting has... [3132 chars]

title: Daughter suspected in attack on German mayor, police say
description: Iris Stalzer - due to take office next month - was found with multiple stab wounds in Herdecke on Tuesday.
content:
The incoming German mayor found at home with stab wounds named her daughter as a suspect in the attack, police have said.
Officers said that Iris Stalzer - due to take office next month in Herdecke, in the Ruhr region, after being elected on 28 Septe... [1680 chars]

title: Kate McCann tells court of stress caused by alleged stalker calling her ‘Mum’
description: Julia Wandelt is on trial accused of targeting the McCann family with a two-and-a-half-year harassment campaign
content:
Kate McCann has said it was hard to hear an alleged stalker refer to her as “Mum”, as she gave evidence in the trial of a woman who claimed to be her missing daughter.
